tool_description: Signs certificate requests using the CA's private key, generating X.509 certificates with proper extensions, validity periods, and digital signatures.

ca_private_key_id.description: Identifier of the CA private key to use for signing

error_messages: Invalid CSR data: CSR must be properly formatted and parseable.
Template not found: Specified template_id does not exist or is not accessible.
Duplicate serial number: The serial number is already in use by another certificate.
Invalid validity period: Validity period exceeds maximum allowed by template or policy.
CA key not available: Specified CA private key is not available or accessible.
Signature generation failed: Unable to generate digital signature, check CA key and algorithm compatibility.
Extension processing error: Unable to process required certificate extensions.
usage: Provide CSR data, template_id, serial_number, validity_period_days, key_usage, and ca_private_key_id. Tool will generate and sign the certificate according to the template specifications.

certificate_pem.description: Base64-encoded signed certificate in PEM format

issuer_dn.description: Distinguished name of the certificate issuer
